modifier.tconstruct.beating.description: This trophy from the depths allows an extra upgrade slot
With our powers combined we grant you an extra defense slot
modifier.tconstruct.reinforced_echo_shar: Advances in sculk technology have led to general stat buffs when applying warden upgrades. How odd it only works on weapons...
modifier.tconstruct.tank2.flavor: More tank per tank, what's not to love?
modifier.tconstruct.tank2.description: More fluid space for your tinkers tools, enjoy!
